PhaseEditor.Title: Phase Editor
PhaseEditor.TableHeader.PhaseIcon.Hint: A Font Awesome CSS class, example 'fa-sparkles'
PhaseEditor.Button.Close.Caption: Close
PhaseEditor.Button.Update.Caption: Save

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_PHASES.Name: Enable phases
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_PHASES.Hint: Enables custom defined phases for the combat tracker. Each phase has its own initiative order. Adds context menu items in the Combat Tracker that allows for changing the phase of a combatant token.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_DEFINED_PHASES.Name: Defined phases
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_DEFINED_PHASES.Hint: Custom defined phases for the combat tracker. A string with a valid JSON expression. Format example: {"phases":[{"name":"Magic","icon":"fa-sparkles"},{"name":"Missile","icon":"fa-bullseye"},{"name":"Melee","icon":"fa-swords"},{"name":"Manoeuvers","icon":"fa-person-walking"}]}

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_DISPOSITION.Name: Enable disposition change
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_DISPOSITION.Hint: Adds context menu items in the Combat Tracker that allows for changing the disposition of a combatant token. Applies for GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_USE_ACTOR_PORTRAIT.Name: Use actor portraits for GMs
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_USE_ACTOR_PORTRAIT.Hint: When checked, the Combat Tracker will use the token actors portrait as image instead of the token image. Applies for GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_USE_ACTOR_PORTRAIT.Name: Use actor portraits for players
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_USE_ACTOR_PORTRAIT.Hint: When checked, the Combat Tracker will use the token actors portrait as image instead of the token image. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_DISPOSITION_F.Name: Show disposition for GMs
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_DISPOSITION_F.Hint: When checked, the Combat Tracker will indicate by color the disposition of the combatant. Applies for GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_DISPOSITION_F.Name: Show disposition for players
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_DISPOSITION_F.Hint: When checked, the Combat Tracker will indicate by color the disposition of the combatant. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_NAME_MASKIN.Name: Enable name masking
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_NAME_MASKIN.Hint: When checked, GMs can toggle masking the name of combatants for non-GMs in the Combat Tracker.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_VISIBILITY_.Name: Enable visibility toggle
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_VISIBILITY_.Hint: When checked, GMs can toggle visibility of the combatant token in the Combat Tracker.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ADD_COMBATANTS_NAM.Name: Add NPC combatants with name masked
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ADD_COMBATANTS_NAM.Hint: When checked, adding a NPC token to the Combat Tracker will have its name masked for non-GMs. Only used if[Enable name masking] is checked.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ADD_COMBATANTS_HID.Name: Add NPC combatants as hidden
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ADD_COMBATANTS_HID.Hint: When checked, adding a NPC token to the Combat Tracker will be added as hidden.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_OBSCURE_COMBATANT.Name: Enable obscure combatant
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_OBSCURE_COMBATANT.Hint: When checked, the Combat Tracker will display combatants/information based on module settings and ownership. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_OBSCURE_COMBATANT_.Name: Obscure combatant by visibility
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_OBSCURE_COMBATANT_.Hint: When checked, the Combat Tracker will only display combatants that has token visible for the user. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_OBSCURE_COMBATANT_.Name: Obscure combatant by disposition
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_OBSCURE_COMBATANT_.Hint: When checked, the Combat Tracker will display combatants/information for tokens based on their disposition and current settings. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_REVERSE_INITIATIVE.Name: Reverse initiative
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_REVERSE_INITIATIVE.Hint: Reverse the sorting order for initiative so that lowest goes first.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_DUPLICATE_C.Name: Duplicate combatant
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_DUPLICATE_C.Hint: Add a 'Duplicate Combatant' context menu item in the Combat Tracker that allows each token to have multiple combatants to give the possibility to get multiple actions in the same round.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_INITIATIVE_.Name: Initiative input field
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_INITIATIVE_.Hint: Replace the normal initiative value with a number input field.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_INITIATIVE_INPUT_M.Name: Minimum initiative input allowed
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_INITIATIVE_INPUT_M.Hint: The minimum number that can be entered into the initiative input field.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_INITIATIVE_INPUT_M.Name: Maximum initiative input allowed
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_INITIATIVE_INPUT_M.Hint: The maximum number that can be entered into the initiative input field.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_INITIATIVES_F.Name: Show FRIENDLY combatants initiative
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_INITIATIVES_F.Hint: If unchecked, combatants with FRIENDLY token disposition will not show their initiative value in the Combat Tracker. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_INITIATIVES_N.Name: Show NEUTRAL combatants initiative
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_INITIATIVES_N.Hint: If unchecked, combatants with NEUTRAL token disposition will not show their initiative value in the Combat Tracker. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_INITIATIVES_H.Name: Show HOSTILE combatants initiative
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_INITIATIVES_H.Hint: If unchecked, combatants with HOSTILE token disposition will not show their initiative value in the Combat Tracker. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_INITIATIVES_S.Name: Show SECRET combatants initiative
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_INITIATIVES_S.Hint: If unchecked, combatants with SECRET token disposition will not show their initiative value in the Combat Tracker. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_FR.Name: Show FRIENDLY combatants
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_FR.Hint: If unchecked, combatants with FRIENDLY token disposition will not be shown in the Combat Tracker. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_NE.Name: Show NEUTRAL combatants
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_NE.Hint: If unchecked, combatants with NEUTRAL token disposition will not be shown in the Combat Tracker. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_HO.Name: Show HOSTILE combatants
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_HO.Hint: If unchecked, combatants with HOSTILE token disposition will not be shown in the Combat Tracker. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_SE.Name: Show SECRET combatants
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_SE.Hint: If unchecked, combatants with SECRET token disposition will not be shown in the Combat Tracker. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_NP.Name: Show NPCs combatants
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_NP.Hint: If unchecked, NPC combatants will not be shown in the Combat Tracker. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_NO.Name: Show non-NPCs combatants
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_NO.Hint: If unchecked, non-NPC combatants will not be shown in the Combat Tracker. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.
